site_name: Land West Of Hawkhirst Road North Of LongwoodRoad Opposite House No. 23KenleyCR8 5DN
description: 1)Ash tree  - advanced stage of infection with dieback disease and risk of falling to Hawkhirst Road if not felled.Number used on the attached plan - no.32) Cutting down the tree at the bottom of trunk and uproot its roots  (by contractor)3) move the cut timber and roots to allocated space within boundaries of owners site(by contractor)4) plant a replacement tree.(owner)2) felling an ash tree no.2 & no.3 opposite house no.21&23 from ground and uproot, 3) moving the timbers and the roots to landowner's specified space within the boundary.
decision_conditions: LOSS OR RISK TO TREES OF AMENITY VALUE
